Sentencas: A detailed three-dimensional model of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is established to explore its performance under special requirements in the aviation SOFC - gas turbine hybrid system.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: In this context, the SOFC has the distinction of pressurization, lightweight and low pressure loss compared to its conventional independent application.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: Based on this, the SOFC performance is fully investigated in terms of different operating conditions and geometric dimensions, and in addition to typical electrochemical parameters, the power-to-weight ratio is also considered as evaluation indicator.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: The results indicate that high operating pressure is beneficial for improving SOFC electrochemical performance, but the performance enhancement becomes slow when pressure exceeds 0.5 MPa.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: The inlet velocities of fuel and air both affect fuel utilization and power density of SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: And the high air velocity is favorable to reduce the SOFC temperature and temperature gradient, but it also increases the pressure drop.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: Therefore, the air inlet velocity of 2 m/s-15 m/s is more suitable under comprehensive consideration.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: In addition, the optimal power density and power-to-weight ratio correspond to different rib widths, with the former having wider ribs and differing within 0.5 mm.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system

Sentencas: And this characteristic is maintained at different pressure, contact resistance and interconnect density.
Titulo: Numerical performance analysis of the solid oxide fuel cell for aviation hybrid power system
